message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  We can work out a better deal in future rounds if you prefer.
I'm not afraid of an unfair deal. You can do better than this.
Okay, I see you're not afraid of a challenge. Let's get closer to a fair split. I'm offering 54 for me, 46 for you. We can keep working towards something we both agree on.
You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up that much yet. Meet me in the middle.
Alright, I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 30, you take 70. This seems like a fair compromise considering the inflation. Let's wrap this up!
